additional_info:
Storeroom, Furniture, Technique, Intercom, Telephone, Internet, Cable-TV, Heating system: central, Hot water: gas 
 Totally newly renovated and restored apartment. All new and stylish furniture and revamped and high quality electrics. Brand new kitchen and kitchen appliances, 42-inch Philips flat screen, central heating, air condition, lots of build in storage, amazing location, few minutes to metro, supermarket and grocery stores. New bath room with high quality equipment and design. There is also a renovated basement with electricity and water supply.

details.address: Tbilisi, Chugureti,  Chugureti, M. Tsinamdzgvrishvili st.
